## patchArray() function

Reducer for [Patch](./transducers-patch.patch.md) based array edits. Only numeric indices are supported (i.e. NO nested edits, use  for that purpose).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function patchArray<T>(immutable?: boolean): Reducer<T[], PatchArrayOp<T> | PatchArrayOp<T>[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  immutable | <code>boolean</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Reducer<T[], PatchArrayOp<T> | PatchArrayOp<T>[]>`

## Remarks

Unless `immutable` is false (default: true), all edits are performed in a non-destructive manner.

The following patch types are supported: - SET - UPDATE - INSERT - DELETE

## Example


```ts
// direct invocation
patchArray(
    true,
    [1, 2, 3],
    [
        [Patch.SET, 0, 42],
        [Patch.UPDATE, 1, (x, n) => x * n, 10],
        [Patch.INSERT, 2, [10, 11]],
        [Patch.DELETE, 3]
    ]
);
// [ 42, 20, 10, 3 ]

```
